**Is your enhancement request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Ex. I find it difficult to manage multiple printer profiles when switching between nozzle sizes.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Ex. I would like to navigate the g-code commands with the mouse wheel when hovering over the command viewer in the preview.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Describe the user benefit / Who does this help?**
A clear and concise description of the benefits the community will gain from this enhancement.

**Provide visuals**
When possible, provide screenshots or mock-ups to help us better visualize your idea.
